title: Five Ten Trailcross LT Mountain Bike Shoes
subtitle: Women's Five Ten
description: Ride. Eat. Sleep. Repeat. Bike packing is synonymous with adventure. The Five Ten Trailcross LT Mountain Bike Shoes scramble over rocky terrain and kick it at camp just as well as they grip pedals. Light, breathable and comfortable enough for all-day wear, you've found the do-it-all adventure bike shoe for the road less traveled.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Breathable mesh upper; Lightweight, durable feel; EVA midsole; Non-Marking Stealth® Phantom Dotty™ rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Magic Lime / Burgundy / Orbit Green; Product code: GY5119
colors: Core Black / Grey Two / Solar Red

title: Five Ten Kestrel Pro Boa Shoes
subtitle: Men's Five Ten
description: Transfer maximum power to the pedals. The Kestrel Pro Boa® combines our stiffest sole and clipless compatibility for an efficient all-mountain ride. The Boa® Fit system means you can dial in a secure fit, while the wide Stealth® C4 rubber sole provides confident footing in all terrain. Mesh inserts enhance breathability, and the quick-drying synthetic upper maintains all-weather comfort.
details: Regular fit; Boa® Fit System for micro-adjustment, and secure and consistent hold; Synthetic weather-resistant micro-perforated upper; Perforated EVA tongue with mesh overlay; Textile lining; Stealth® C4 rubber outsole for unbeatable grip; Durable lightweight EVA midsole; Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite® sockliner; Clipless style; Non-slip heel cup; Stiff carbon-infused nylon shank; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Red / Grey Six; Product code: BC0635

You're unapologetic about who you are. Which is why these adidas sneakers were made to stand out with you. The juniors' shoes are as comfy as they are bold, flaunting unconventional proportions and textures for a futuristic look. Adiplus cushioning ensures every step feels like walking on a cloud.

title: Courtjam Control Tennis Shoes
subtitle: Women's Tennis
description: Don't just compete. Dominate. The mesh upper and flexible Bounce midsole on these adidas Courtjam Control Tennis Shoes team up to keep you comfortable as you build pressure on your opponent. Underneath, a TPU midfoot shank and grippy Adiwear hard court outsole ensure you're stable through every slide and sidestep. On the medial side, a combination of hidden lacing and abrasion zones specifically configured for the women's game help these shoes tough out every challenge.

Take the path less traveled.

description:
The future of basketball is all about speed, and Donovan Mitchell is as fast as they come. These juniors' signature shoes from Mitchell and adidas Basketball are built specifically to elevate the movements of one of the game's fastest, most dynamic scorers. Ultralight Lightstrike teams up with a LIGHTLOCK upper for a snug fit and an explosive propulsion system that won't weigh you down. A unique rubber outsole is designed to generate traction where you need it most, so every hard-charging cut and head fake has total support. Mitchell's Spida logo and signature graphics provide the finishing touches.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

description:
Each day brings a new opportunity to run toward your goals. Whether you're training for your first 5K or breaking the tape with a new personal best, you'll feel supported every step of the way in these adidas running shoes. They have less volume in the forefoot and a narrower heel for a customized feel. BOOST in the midsole provides endless energy return, and adidas LEP 2.0 guides each foot strike to propel you forward.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; BOOST midsole; adidas LEP 2.0; Weight 9.8 ounces (size 7.5); Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 32 mm / forefoot: 22 mm); Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Iron Metallic / Core Black; Product code: HR0163

description:
You lace up for a reason. Don't let anything take away from that. Which is easy, when you have these adidas by Stella McCartney Ultraboost 22 Elevated Shoes on your feet to make sure distractions aren't a part of your miles. It's all comfort, stability and style with these trainers — with a flexible sock-like upper encased in a distinctive cage for adaptability and support. 

The Linear Energy Push system brings a 15% increase in forefoot bending stiffness to create a more responsive stride. Pairing that with plush Boost cushioning means every step is supported with incredible energy return and unparalleled comfort.

To reduce our reliance on virgin materials, we make sure that our vegan alternatives also contain a minimum of 25% recycled content.

description:
The past informs the future, and the future inspires today. These timeless shoes for juniors fuse the best of yesterday with a tech-forward modern look, creating an iconic silhouette that celebrates global style. Classic 3-Stripes fall in line on each side, repping adidas with a subtle nod. The BOOST outsole promises energy return and instant comfort with each step, and a mesh upper keeps every stride cool, comfortable and dry. 

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Mesh upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Royal Blue; Product code: HQ9991
colors: Cloud White / Off White / Green

description:
Spread the love and celebrate the planet with these juniors' adidas Forum Low shoes designed in collaboration with André Saraiva. Saraiva's collection aspires to inspire an appreciation for sustainability. The graffiti-style artwork pairs with his signature smiling Mr. A character on the upper to give you plenty of reasons to smile.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure with hook-and-loop strap; Synthetic upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cream White / Core Black; Product code: GZ1761

description:
Inventive little minds will appreciate these toddlers' adidas shoes built with LEGO® studs at the heel. And when your little one kicks up their feet, they'll show off the colorful LEGO® bricks that add grip to the outsole. A soft lining provides added warmth, so they're great for outdoor play.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Elastic lace closure with hook-and-loop strap; Textile upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; LEGO® rubber outsole pod; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Reflective / Eqt Yellow; Product code: GW6420
colors: Ecru Tint / Bahia Orange / Red

description:
Engage in the world around you. In these adidas by Stella McCartney trail running shoes, that's even easier to do. They're mindfully designed for you to connect to nature and connect with yourself. Terrex tooling on the durable rubber outsole keeps you upright and pushing forward on unpredictable, uneven terrain. And since you keep going even when the temperature drops, COLD.RDY technology offers insulated warmth, holding in heat and helping you stay dry when you get out there.

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Lightweight feel; Boost midsole; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Primegreen; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Active Purple / Shock Yellow; Product code: GX9873
colors: Cloud White / Semi Impact Orange / Core Black

description:
Celebrate your favorite major league club every time you lace up. The Ultraboost x Copa collaboration brings a classic soccer shoe look to comfortable, everyday running shoes. The responsive midsole fuses hundreds of adidas BOOST capsules for incredible energy return to power your daily adventures.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; BOOST midsole; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Turbo / Legend Ink / Cloud White; Product code: HQ5905
colors: Core Black / Team Victory Red / Cloud White

details: Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Silver Metallic / Cloud White; Product code: GV6767
colors: Off White / Team Sand / Core Black

description:
Lace up in these juniors' adidas running shoes and crush your day. Rooted in sport and made for comfort, they have full-length BOOST that's wrapped with a 3D Stretchweb outsole for optimal energy return. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper gives a supportive fit, and cutouts provide airflow so your feet stay cool and comfy.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Sock-like fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper with cutouts for airflow; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Weight: 10.1 ounces; Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 21 mm / forefoot: 11 mm); 3D Stretchweb rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Off White / Cloud White / Ecru Tint; Product code: GX7356
colors: Off White / Cloud White / Ecru Tint
